title: Laser Machining and Designs

services.description: Precision laser cutting and engraving services for metals and non-metals.
Capability to create intricate designs, prototypes, and custom components with high accuracy.

title: Powder Coating

services.description: In-house powder coating services that provide durable and aesthetically pleasing finishes for metal components.
A wide range of colors and textures to suit customer specifications.

title: Electrical Design and Consultation

services.description: Expertise in designing electrical systems for residential, commercial, and industrial projects.
Load analysis and power distribution planning.
Energy-efficient solutions and renewable energy integrations.
Compliance with safety standards and regulations.
End-to-end consultation, from initial concept to implementation and post-installation support.
